preqs: CHM1011 or CHM1051 or CHM1022 or CHM1052 or CHM2735 or PSC1021 or PSC1022

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CHM1011, CHM1022, CHM1051, CHM1052, CHM2735, PSC1021, PSC1022}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BCH2011, BIO1011, BMS1011, CHE2165, PSC2011, PSC2041} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CHM1011, CHM1022, CHM1051, CHM1052, CHM2735, PSC1021, PSC1022})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-CHEM, MAECHEM01} Otherwise true

description: This unit explores how scalable, commercially viable process-unit operations are harnessed by the biotechnology industry for the production of valuable biomolecules (eg recombinant proteins, peptides, vaccines, enzymes, and nucleic acids). The design, operation and economic issues surrounding large-scale biomolecular process equipment including bioreactors, filtration systems, chromatographic columns, sterilisation and aseptic operation, auxiliary equipment and the associated control systems will be considered. The wider biotechnology environment will be considered especially with regards to GxP, national and international regulatory bodies, biosafety and commercialisation.
